titleStmt.title: The copie of the letter sent from Generall Lesley to the Lord Generall the Earle of Holland and read in the House of Commons the 7th. of July 1641.
titleStmt.author: Leven, Alexander Leslie, Earl of, 1580?-1661.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated at end: Dorrington 2⁰ July 1641. H. Lesley.
Reproduction of the original in Guildhall, London.
